channel.title: Stream the desktop with python
channel.description: Hello guys it's my first post here :) First it's great for me to be part of this community because you are really great people . Second i have finished a reverse shell in python and i have added a lot of features but the only thing i couldn't add was stream the desktop like vnc in metasploit . So my question is it's possible to make it with python ? And if the answer is yes how can i do that ? Thanks anyway :D

item.title: Stream the desktop with python
item.dc:creator: MNG
item.description:
Hello guys it’s my first post here
First it’s great for me to be part of this community because you are really great people .
Second i have finished a reverse shell in python and i have added a lot of features but the only thing i couldn’t add was stream the desktop like vnc in metasploit .
So my question is it’s possible to make it with python ?
And if the answer is yes how can i do that ?
Thanks anyway

Read full topic
